title: Galaxy S23 Ultra
description: We've raised the bar with a 200MP camera and our fastest mobile processor ever. Save up to $1,030. Get a free storage upgrade○ and $100 instant Samsung Credit.∆ Plus, get up to $750 instant trade-in credit.θ Select devices only.

title: Galaxy S23+
description: Share the epic with our fastest mobile processor ever and enhanced low-light selfies. Save up to $920. Get a free storage upgrade (up to a $120 value)○ and up to $100 instant Samsung Credit with select devices.∆ Plus, get up to $700 instant trade-in credit.θ

title: Galaxy S22
description: The slim bezels of the Samsung Galaxy S22 along with a polished frame feel like a work of art in your hands. The frame in Armor Aluminum protects the phone from falls and IP68 certification provides protection against water and dust. Sunlight, meet Galaxy S22's bright and Galaxy S22+'s brightest display*. The stunning Dynamic AMOLED 2X display is crafted specifically for high outdoor visibility, keeping the view clear in bright daylight.**`

title: Galaxy Z Flip4
description: Flexibility has never been so strong. An IPX8 rating makes Flip4 the only water-resistant foldable smartphone. 2 Its scratch-defying front and back covers are made of the toughest glass on a foldable device: Corning® Gorilla® Glass Victus™+. Meanwhile, the hinge is caged in lightweight Armor Aluminum, the strongest in the mobile industry, and Ultra Thin Glass protects the Main Screen, fold after fold.

title: Galaxy Z Fold4
description: You get limitless possibilities with the innovative design of the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold4 smartphone. It comes with an innovative foldable design with a 6.2' Dynamic AMOLED screen on the front and a 7.6' Dynamic AMOLED screen when unfolded.

title: iPhone 14 Plus
description: The iPhone 14 Plus smartphone is equipped with an amazing dual 12 Mpx camera setup with Photonic Engine, powerful A15 Bionic processor and 5G data connection. The large battery lasts longer and has both wired and MagSafe wireless charging.

title: iPhone 14 Pro
description: The iPhone 14 Pro smartphone offers an incredible 6.1' OLED touch screen with variable 120Hz refresh rate, powerful A16 Bionic processor with 5G data connectivity and industry-leading IP68 water resistance.

title: iPhone 13
description: New iPhone 13 smartphone has an improved dual 12Mpx camera with sensor-shift OIS and A15 Bionic processor with 5G support and powerful AI functions. It is IP68 certified and very durable.

title: iPhone SE
description: Get the iPhone experience at a great price. The A15 Bionic chipset gives you the power of iPhone 13 in a compact format. iPhone SE Gen. 3 is protected against water and dust and is covered by one of the toughest smartphone glass.
